text: The end of Putana  shocked Kamsa's court.
Kamsa and his evil ministers couldn't believe the message.
Oh king, the demise of Putana is unbelievable.
Who could kill a huge Demoness like, her?
Yes, but now it's clear that our enemy is in Gokul.
So Kamsa tried desperately to find a way to get rid off Krishna, and then he hit upon a plan.
Trinavart !!!
Suddenly, with a gust of whirling wind , the evil spirit appeared in the court.
It was none other than Trinavart.
Yes, your majesty.
Trinavart.  Go  to Gokul and find out who's responsible for the death of Putana
and destroy him.
As you order, your majesty.
Back in Gokul, Yashoda was busy in her household chores,
and she left baby Krishna in the courtyard all by himself.
(Demon's laughter)
Just then, the demon Trinavart,  appeared in the form of a whirlwind and flew away with the child.
Yashoda couldn't believe her eyes and started shouting for help.
Krishna, Krishna, Krishna, Krishna
Please, please somebody help Krishna.
He's being carried by wind. Krishna Krishna.
But of no use. Trinavart rose very high into the sky.
He planned to carry the child as high as possible
and then dash it to the ground.
Oh. So you are Krishna
It seems all the people in Gokul praise you and you were there when Putana  was killed.
It seems you had something to do with it. I am going to kill you now
But little Krishna was becoming heavier and heavier.
The demon felt as if he was carrying a  heavy mountain.
(demon grunting )
Krishna   Krishna
(Demon grunting in anger)
(The demon shouting in pain)
Krishna
The child squeezed the neck of the Demon and choked him to death.
The Gopis saw a huge body of the demon stretched on the ground.
Yashoda came to the place and searched for her little Krishna,
but Krishna was playing on the Demon's chest as if nothing had happened.
Yashoda took her  child immediately.
